mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT board.boardTitle, board.boardProPrice, location.locationName, kategory.kategoryName, state.stateName, board.boardHitCnt,board.boardLike, board.boardContents,board.boardUserId, board.boardNum FROM board board JOIN location location ON location.locationNum = board.boardUserCheck JOIN kategory kategory ON kategory.kategoryNum = board.boardKategory JOIN file file ON file.fileBoardNum = board.boardNum JOIN state state ON board.boardProState = state.stateNum WHERE board.boardUserId = 'ㅊㅊㅊ' AND board.deleted_yn='N';
mapper.insert: insert into board (boardTitle, boardKategory, boardUserId, boardContents, boardDate, boardProPrice) values(#{boardTitle},#{boardKategory},'ㅊㅊㅊ',#{boardContents},now(),#{boardProPrice});
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT board.boardTitle, board.boardProPrice, location.locationName, kategory.kategoryName, state.stateName, board.boardHitCnt,board.boardLike, board.boardContents,board.boardUserId, board.boardNum, board.boardDate, user.userManner FROM board board JOIN location location ON location.locationNum = board.boardUserCheck JOIN kategory kategory ON kategory.kategoryNum = board.boardKategory JOIN file file ON file.fileBoardNum = board.boardNum JOIN state state ON board.boardProState = state.stateNum JOIN user user ON board.boardUserId = user.userId WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum} AND board.deleted_yn='N';
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET boardHitCnt = boardHitCnt + 1 WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum}
